net.morimekta.providence.maven.plugin

Class ProvidenceAssemblyMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.morimekta.providence.maven.plugin.ProvidenceAssemblyMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="assemble",
      defaultPhase=PACKAGE,
      instantiationStrategy=PER_LOOKUP)
public class ProvidenceAssemblyMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Generate providence sources from thrift definitions.

      • skipAssembly

        @Parameter(alias="skip",
           defaultValue="false")
protected boolean skipAssembly
        Skip the providence assembly step for this module.

      • files

        @Parameter(alias="inputFiles")
protected org.codehaus.plexus.components.io.fileselectors.IncludeExcludeFileSelector files
        Files to assemble. By default will select all '.thrift' files in 'src/main/providence/' and subdirectories.

      • classifier

        @Parameter(defaultValue="providence")
protected String classifier
        Classifier name to use for the artifact. By default it's 'providence', but it can be replaced depending on needs (and if there are multiple artifacts to be exposed).

      • buildDir

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${project.build.directory}",
           readonly=true)
protected File buildDir
        Location of the output artifact.

      • project

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${project}",
           readonly=true,
           required=true)
protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project

protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProjectHelper projectHelper
